transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? So very good afternoon.

Customer: Afternoon sir.

Executive: Sir, Sumit baat kar raha hu sir mai IndiaMART se, kaise hai aap?

Customer: Ha ha ha sir.

Executive: Sir, maine basically call, ha, bas ekdam badhiya sir ji, thank you for asking. Maine sir basically call isliye kiya, hamari jo firm chal rahi hai apni Junagadh, Gujarat se, Jyoti Trader Enterprises ke naam se. Actually sir aapka mere executive ke saath discussion hua tha, fourth of November ko, uska kehna hai aapne feedback aap jo bhi diya hai ki aap uski conversation se satisfied nahi the, right?

Customer: Nahi sir lekin ha ha matlab abhi matlab jaisa response chahiye tha, waisa response abhi nahi mil raha hai.

Customer: To isiliye baat hui thi ki jab aapko response na mile to hum aapko matlab jitna payment hua utna thik hai, baki ka aage ka sab wapis de denge sir.

Executive: Aisa kisne bola tha aapko?

Customer: Jab jab humne join kiya tha tabhi bola tha.

Executive: Aapko sir aisa koi cheeze unhone likh vagera kabhi de rakha hai sir aisa kuch kya?

Customer: Ha.

Executive: Written vagera me aisa kuch bheja hai aisa kuch kya aapko?

Customer: Written me nahi, aisa bola tha ki aapko agar lage do teen mahine aapke paas itni inquiry aise nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: To sir dekho query vagera agar aapke, nahi, mai bata deta hu sir dekho query vagera agar aapke product se related nahi hai, kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai to wo to sir dekho hum aapko yaha pe help out karwa payenge cheezo ko leke, keywords wise kon kon se hai, kis tarike se hum add on kar payenge cheezo ko leke, wo humse yaha pe dekho sorted kara payenge. Dekho aisa koi refund policy nahi hoti hai, aap ek kaam kara dijiye sir aaj agar possible hai sir ek video meeting abhi kar lete hai cheezo ko leke, usme jo bhi jo bhi keywords vagera hai aapki guidance ke saath saath kaha usme kya modifications vagera hum kar sakte hai ya kis keywords ko aapke kis naam se jana jata hai basically buyer, to unhe hum update karte hai aapse, to agar possibilities hai aapke paas.

Customer: Ha aisa karo ki hamara mera aap a kya to hamara hamare jiske saath baat chit hui thi to kisne starting me handover kiya tha, matlab uska uske saath mujhe baat karni hai.

Executive: To sir uska to number dekho aapke paas hoga hi jinhone aapko handover kiya tha IndiaMART se.

Customer: Lekin isme nahi abhi nahi hai mera mobile badla hua hai to.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Aap mujhe karwa do baat, kyuki usne kaha tha mujhe ki aapko do teen mahine me wo achha response na mile.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: To bhi thik hai aap jitna payment hua utna thik hai aage ka nahi karna hai.

Executive: Dekho sir ye cheez na hum iske liye aapse ye dekho sir aapme unko number to aapko de dunga agar system me honge to aap unse properly baat kar lijiyega lekin dekho aisa koi policies hoti nahi hai isliye to hum aapse jab aap IndiaMART me jude the August me aur maine jab online demo aapka hua tha puri services ka tabhi hum aapse tabhi bhi initial stage me bhi hum aapse puchte hai ki koi sir aapko galat commitment vagera to nahi kiya hai kisi ne kuch bhi aur aapne tab humse kuch aisa bola bhi nahi hai dusri cheez aapne kuch hum uss samay naya products bhi diye the add on karne ke liye catalogs vagera pe to wo bhi humne usi hisab se aapki guidance ke saath saath add.

Customer: Wo to sab kar diye the lekin jo inquiry chahiye usi inquiry abhi mere ko abhi bataiye, abhi mere ko bataiye aap basically kis type ki query chah rahe hai sir jo aapko nahi mil rahi hai wo bataiye aap mere ko.

Customer: Hum abhi bhi call karte hai na sabko to waise hi bolte hai hume iski requirement nahi hai, hume particular koi brand ki, chalo wo to samjha koi brand ki requirement hai, kuch log phone nahi uthate, kuch log phone uthate to aise hi keh dete hai ki hume requirement nahi hai, hum aise hi dekh rahe the aur requirement chali gayi.

Executive: Sir dekho mai aapko bata hu, dekho online me se saat log to interest hi nahi le rahe.

Executive: Ha, sir mai aapko ek cheez batata hu dekho aap kisi bhi online portal pe jayiyega sir dekho hota kya hai na ki open platform hai for everyone to yaha pe basically buyer kuch competitors vagera bhi requirements dalte hai, kuch aapke relevance bhi waha pe milti hai aapke product se related kuch brands ki hoti hai to basically sir dekho kya hai agar buyer mere brands ka tabhi query dal payega jab mere brands wo zyada ek tarike se famous vagera bhi hoga cheezo ko leke. Abhi mere ko sir agar apne brands me buyer ko convert bhi karna hai Dharmashink wale pe to basically sir yahi hai ki mai apne sare brands vagera ki queries vagera ko karna connect karke dusre walo ki bhi aur apne wale me usko convert kara pau cheezo ko leke.

Customer: Ha uski koi dikkat nahi hai wo mai samajhta hu particular hamari lekin 10 me se saat to aisi hoti hai ki phone nahi uthate kar do.

Executive: Sir dekho, dekho sir ek cheez to aap mante ho na sir dekho ek baat ho sakta hai ki buyer phone na uthaye lekin usko whatsapp vagera pe mai ek cheez wahi chah raha hu ek bar hum usse na sara coordination aapke saath video meeting vagera pe kar paye kyuki cheeze dekho aap bhi dekho hamesha free nahi hai ki mai aapko call karu aap possibility ho ki aap meri sari calls utha paye dekho possibility nahi hai aap bhi as a ek businessman ho to us cheez ko ya to hum whatsapp vagera pe le paye cheezo ko leke ya hum GST verified buyleads vagera ko hum apna connect kar paye sir. Jaise mai abhi aapki dekh raha hu abhi jo last leads aapne purchase kari thi wo 14th of November ko purchase ki thi sir aapne.

Customer: Right.

Executive: Hai na? Ab jo 14th ko aapne buyleads purchase kari wo sari ki sari leads aapni 13th November ki thi. Usse pehle sir aapne dekho ek 11th ko ki thi jisme se ek 11th ki thi do 10th ki thi. Fir aapne 10th November ko buyleads purchase kari dono buyleads 9th November ki thi. To basically mera sir bas aapko bas wahi thoda sa batana chah raha tha ki jo bhi hum queries vagera connect kare na sir pehla focus to dekho hum yahi kare ki humni latest inquiries purchase kar paye aur GST verified leads vagera ki connect kare. Waha pe ye nahi bolunga ki dekho to 100% conversion hoga lekin ha waha pe chances ye hai ki probability zyada hai ki buyer ke saath aap connect kar pau cheezo ko leke. Abhi isliye bataiye sir agar aap aaj 3:00-3:30 baje agar possibility ho pa rahi hai 3:00-3:30 baje to ek bar video meeting pe aake one to one discussion kar lete hai kuch queries vagera pe kis tarike se hum help out kar paye waha pe sir.

Customer: Hmm. Aap kitne baje ke?

Executive: 5:00 baje na?

Customer: Ha.

Executive: Koi problem nahi hai sir mai ek bar aapko. Abhi abhi dekho abhi requirement hai ye vitamin C serum ki aur maine application khol ke dekha to wo ek din pehle ki notification abhi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Sir notification ko mai sahi kar leta hu mai bata hu notification isliye nahi ho raha aaya hoga kabhi kabhi ho jata hai ki buyer se aap reply karte ho ya kuch bhi nahi karte to halka halka kam ho jata hai to wo mai sari cheeze ek bar settings laptop pe jab aap join karoge na mai aapki settings vagera bhi sahi karwa dunga waha pe notifications vagera ki sir aisa ho ki aapse wo disable vagera kuch ho gaya ho jiski wajah se notifications vagera nahi aa rahi hongi. To pura pehle panel me dobara se ek bar aapko 5:00 baje video meeting pe rakh ke na sari cheeze dobara se elaborate karwa deta hu kis tarike se kaise kar sakte hai is cheezo ko leke sir.

Customer: Okay thik hai.

Executive: Thik hai na? Ha mai ek bar 5:00 baje connect karwata hu aapko. Thik hai sir fir 5:00 baje baat karte hai one to one sari queries vagera pe. Thank you so much sir.

Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with the responses.

- Wants to talk to the executive who onboarded him.

- Receiving old notifications in the application.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issues.

- Agreed to provide the number of onboarding executive.

- Will fix the notification issue in the application.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled at 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification, buyleads, notifications
